page.title: 11Ropley Playgroup
page.content: Ropley playgroup is held in the Parish Hall four days a week-Mon.,Wed.,Thurs. & Fri.from 9.15-12 noon,& Thurs. from 1.45-3.15.There are up to 24 children aged 3-5 years at each session & five helpers.The children learn many skills through play,the most important being to socialize with others.Play is with a wide variety of toys - sand,water, climbing frame & slide,puzzles,games, construction toys,clay & dough,a home corner with dolls and prams,a railway & road layout and many table toys.The children also enjoy several different forms of painting,including hand and feet painting.They make models from junk and collage from rubbish.There is a comfortable book corner and the children also have music and movement sessions.They have musical instruments which they can play.The mothers pay 85 pence for each session.
